channel.title: Research on Chih Yu's Land
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Chih Yu's Land

item.title: NCKU HPPCC
item.description:
我們是國立成功大學李崇綱教授的研究團隊，研究領域包括自然對流、可壓縮流、氣動聲學等。使用超級電腦進行平行化運算，並透過流場可視化分析結果。

We are the research group of Prof. Li Chung-Gang at National Cheng Kung University (NCKU). Our work focuses on natural convection, compressible flows, and aeroacoustics. We leverage supercomputing resources for large-scale parallel simulations and analyze flow behavior through advanced flow-field visualization.
